doc.title: Mnemosyne
doc.plot: The film "Mnemosyne" is based on the ancient poem "Thunder, Perfect Mind", a visual journey of the human race, exploring where we have been and what we can become. We are taken on this journey through the voice and body of Mnemosyne, Mother of Memory. Mnemosyne bears witness to the forces of destruction as well as of creation, revealing through art, the multi-dimensionality of women. The film is an homage to power, strength and individualism.
